table_description: GitHub Organizations are shared accounts where businesses and open-source projects can collaborate across many projects at once.

columns.name: login
columns.description: The login name of the organization.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID number of the organization.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: The node ID of the organization.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The display name of the organization.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the organization was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the organization was last updated.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the organization.

columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address associated with the organization.

columns.name: url
columns.description: The URL for this organization.

columns.name: announcement
columns.description: The text of the announcement.

columns.name: announcement_expires_at
columns.description: The expiration date of the announcement, if any.

columns.name: announcement_user_dismissible
columns.description: If true, the announcement can be dismissed by the user.

columns.name: any_pinnable_items
columns.description: If true, this organization has items that can be pinned to their profile.

columns.name: avatar_url
columns.description: URL pointing to the organization's public avatar.

columns.name: estimated_next_sponsors_payout_in_cents
columns.description: The estimated next GitHub Sponsors payout for this organization in cents (USD).

columns.name: has_sponsors_listing
columns.description: If true, this organization has a GitHub Sponsors listing.

columns.name: interaction_ability
columns.description: The interaction ability settings for this organization.

columns.name: is_sponsoring_you
columns.description: If true, you are sponsored by this organization.

columns.name: is_verified
columns.description: If true, the organization has verified its profile email and website.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The organization's public profile location.

columns.name: monthly_estimated_sponsors_income_in_cents
columns.description: The estimated monthly GitHub Sponsors income for this organization in cents (USD).

columns.name: new_team_url
columns.description: URL for creating a new team.

columns.name: pinned_items_remaining
columns.description: Returns how many more items this organization can pin to their profile.

columns.name: projects_url
columns.description: URL listing organization's projects.

columns.name: saml_identity_provider
columns.description: The Organization's SAML identity provider. Visible to (1) organization owners, (2) organization owners' personal access tokens (classic) with read:org or admin:org scope, (3) GitHub App with an installation token with read or write access to members, else null.

columns.name: sponsors_listing
columns.description: The GitHub sponsors listing for this organization.

columns.name: teams_url
columns.description: URL listing organization's teams.

columns.name: total_sponsorship_amount_as_sponsor_in_cents
columns.description: The amount in United States cents (e.g., 500 = $5.00 USD) that this entity has spent on GitHub to fund sponsorships. Only returns a value when viewed by the user themselves or by a user who can manage sponsorships for the requested organization.

columns.name: twitter_username
columns.description: The organization's Twitter username.

columns.name: can_administer
columns.description: If true, you can administer the organization.

columns.name: can_changed_pinned_items
columns.description: If true, you can change the pinned items on the organization's profile.

columns.name: can_create_projects
columns.description: If true, you can create projects for the organization.

columns.name: can_create_repositories
columns.description: If true, you can create repositories for the organization.

columns.name: can_create_teams
columns.description: If true, you can create teams within the organization.

columns.name: can_sponsor
columns.description: If true, you can sponsor this organization.

columns.name: is_a_member
columns.description: If true, you are an active member of the organization.

columns.name: is_following
columns.description: If true, you are following the organization.

columns.name: is_sponsoring
columns.description: If true, you are sponsoring the organization.

columns.name: website_url
columns.description: URL for the organization's public website.

columns.name: hooks
columns.description: The Hooks of the organization.

columns.name: billing_email
columns.description: The email address for billing.

columns.name: two_factor_requirement_enabled
columns.description: If true, all members in the organization must have two factor authentication enabled.

columns.name: default_repo_permission
columns.description: The default repository permissions for the organization.

columns.name: members_allowed_repository_creation_type
columns.description: Specifies which types of repositories non-admin organization members can create

columns.name: members_can_create_internal_repos
columns.description: If true, members can create internal repositories.

columns.name: members_can_create_pages
columns.description: If true, members can create pages.

columns.name: members_can_create_private_repos
columns.description: If true, members can create private repositories.

columns.name: members_can_create_public_repos
columns.description: If true, members can create public repositories.

columns.name: members_can_create_repos
columns.description: If true, members can create repositories.

columns.name: members_can_fork_private_repos
columns.description: If true, members can fork private organization repositories.

columns.name: plan_filled_seats
columns.description: The number of used seats for the plan.

columns.name: plan_name
columns.description: The name of the GitHub plan.

columns.name: plan_private_repos
columns.description: The number of private repositories for the plan.

columns.name: plan_seats
columns.description: The number of available seats for the plan

columns.name: plan_space
columns.description: The total space allocated for the plan.

columns.name: members_with_role_total_count
columns.description: Count of members with a role within the organization.

columns.name: packages_total_count
columns.description: Count of packages within the organization.

columns.name: pinnable_items_total_count
columns.description: Count of pinnable items within the organization.

columns.name: pinned_items_total_count
columns.description: Count of itesm pinned to the organization's profile.

columns.name: projects_total_count
columns.description: Count of projects within the organization.

columns.name: projects_v2_total_count
columns.description: Count of V2 projects within the organization.

columns.name: repositories_total_count
columns.description: Count of all repositories within the organization.

columns.name: sponsoring_total_count
columns.description: Count of users the organization is sponsoring.

columns.name: sponsors_total_count
columns.description: Count of sponsors the organization has.

columns.name: teams_total_count
columns.description: Count of teams within the organization.

columns.name: repositories_total_disk_usage
columns.description: Total disk usage for all repositories within the organization.

columns.name: private_repositories_total_count
columns.description: Count of private repositories within the organization.

columns.name: public_repositories_total_count
columns.description: Count of public repositories within the organization.
